column5: This house has plenty of space with a fantastic view from the top terrace, which is perfect for entertaining friends and family. Also, this house is minutes from Galleria, West University Place, The Highland Village, Museum, Zoo, NRG Stadium, Texas Medical center and Downtown. Guest are provided with high speed Wifi, views, full kitchen and laundry access, and their own private bathroom. It should be suitable for travelers, couples, and small families.
column8: Uptown Townhouse minutes away from all the action!
